titles.title: There's A Silent War That's Raging Within Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a silent war that's raging within me,
But lo, a nature fights to dominate.
My Spirit man is poised and locked in battle
With this carnal side of me I've learned to hate.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The trumpet of my prayer plays toward heaven,
A voice of desperation in my cry;
Lord, strengthen me that I might not yield myself to
But keep your righteous banner lifted high.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, I hunger for Your holiness,
And I trust for the righteousness that is Yours;
That my mind would be clean, and my spirit renewed,
And this temple that You dwell in would be pure.
The tempter stalks about me as a lion
Searching for the slightest sense of blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For when the skin of my resistance is broken
He moves in swiftly to deepen the cut.
The Lord of creation hear Your servant;
You understand the weakness of man.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I'm counting myself crucified with Jesus;
Alive with Christ, and dead, indeed, to sin.
Lord, I hunger for holiness,
And I trust for the righteousness that's Yours
That my mind would be clean and my spirit renewed,

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines:
And I trust for the righteousness that is Yours;
That my mind would be clean, and my spirit renewed,
And this temple that You dwell in would be pure.
Lord I hunger, Lord, I hunger for holiness,
For holiness.
